sentences.sContent: He’s only been in this job for nine months.
sentences.sCn: 他干这份工作才九个月。

sentences.sContent: We open at nine (= nine o’clock ).
Kay was taught by her mother till she was nine (= nine years old ).
sentences.sCn: 凯一直由她妈妈教到九岁。

sentences.sContent: ...The River，originating from Qinghai，flows through nine provinces...
...and for the past nine years I've worked at multiple libraries and archives in and around Detroit...
...With the world's population estimated to grow from six to nine billion by 2050...
...and nine times more likely to die of AIDS...

phrases.pCn: n. [俚]九重天（想象中的天堂）；[俚]极乐心境；[俚]狂喜状态
[美口]全部；一切事物；从头至尾
